text: Hi All, our company website in HubSpot <http://www.techedgegroup.com|www.techedgegroup.com> have rate B in the test SSL and we need the rate A, I think the problem is that we must upgrade the TLS because the version 1.0 and 1.1 are deprecated. It's correct? The section for upgrade the TLS version in HubSpot is this? Do you think that we have any problem with out customers on our website? Thanks a lot!

It should be 1.2+
Most of the internet is using it as it was released in 2008
